mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_ID, POST_ID, AUTHOR_ID, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(UPDATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATED_AT, PARENT_ID FROM POST_COMMENT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_COMMENT ( COMMENT_ID, POST_ID, AUTHOR_ID, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, PARENT_ID )VALUES ( COMMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{postId}, 'kmg3592', #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{parentId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE POST_COMMENT SET CONTENT = #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE COMMENT_ID = #{commentId}
